reviews.review: Amazing sequel to Portal. The puzzles in singleplayer seemed to be a little easier than I was expecting (co-op is harder imo), but still really good. The story is amazing and is much more developed than the first game. Challenge mode definitely makes the puzzles much harder and gives the game high replayability. Highly recommended for people who enjoyed Portal!
меня заставили сомневаться в моем уровне развития

Замечательная игра с хорошим сюжетом,юмором и головоломками. Несколько раз перепроходил-всё равно очень интересно и весело. Очень классные миссии кооператива. Всем советую в неё сыграть. 
Моя оценка: 10 синих порталов из 8 оранжевых.
Very fun game. Good experience, good brain work, good everything. More in depth and difficult than the first imo. Its a joy to play.
Очень классная, интересная игра с сюжетом, и кооператив прикольный, игра которая ломает тебе мозги, в которой нужно думать) Лайк

After 9 I finally played this masterpiece for the 1st time and damn everything is just so perfect in this game. From gameplay, story, music etc everything is absolutely amazing. I literally don't have words to express how amazing this game is but the least I could express it is like so: For me, this game sits well beside HL, HL2 if not on top of it!
this game came out years ago and its still beautiful the quirkiness and the music are beyond awesome 10/10
I thought Portal was good, but oh boi, this takes everything to the next level. Puzzles, voice acting and the humor. Oh my god the humor. Makes me laugh every level. So dark.

This game is awesome, the puzzles are intuitive, the story is great, and the characters are hilarious. The fact that this is the highest rated game on Steam pretty much tells you all that you need to know. Though i personally prefer Half-Life 2, but just by a bit.
То чувство, когда за тебя размышлял и проходил друг, а ты просто делал вид что понимаешь о чем он говорит и, что нужно дальше делать :) 10 Уитли из 10, рекомендую!
Just the best. Perfect story, gameplay, it's got it all. Absolute dynamite.
